original: intros n. induction n. - apply HRa. - simpl. apply ctrl_a with (R := UExp F R n) (S := comp (star B) (UExp G R (S (S n))) ). + apply HB. + apply pre_silent. + apply silent. + apply HRa. + apply incl_trans with (UExp G R (S n)). * apply HFGn. * apply HBGGn.
